name: diff-dir
description: Folder diff viewer for macOS using Electron

scripts.dev:electron: wait-on tcp:127.0.0.1:5173 file:dist/main/main/main.js file:dist/main/preload/preload.js file:dist/main/shared/ipc.js && cross-env VITE_DEV_SERVER_URL=http://127.0.0.1:5173 electron .
scripts.build: npm run build:renderer && npm run build:main
scripts.test:e2e: npm run build && playwright test -c playwright.config.ts
scripts.test:e2e:run: npm run build && cross-env RUN_E2E=1 playwright test -c playwright.config.ts
